webpage.para: The alternative to using make is to use XSLT extension functions. Naturally this will only be possible if you're using a processor for which the extensions have been implemented. The Website distribution includes extensions for Xalan and Saxon.

listitem.para: Create your webpages and your layout.xml file.
Use XSLT to create autolayout.xml. Do this by processing your layout.xml with the autolayout.xsl stylesheet.
Use XSLT to build the website: process the autolayout.xml file with the chunk-tabular.xsl stylesheet. That should build your website.
You can use the output-root parameter to direct where the result documents are produced.
